Master Class Bracket 1
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Legend Cup! Archive: MR2 Tournaments: Master Class Bracket 1
By Monster Fenrick on Tuesday, May 7, 2002 - 06:43 pm:

This Tuesday (May 14th) the Master Class Bracket 1 Tournament will take place at the following times:
TIMES:
5pm Pacific, 6pm Mountain, 7pm Central, 8pm Eastern 11:30pm London (Day before@Noon for Syndey Australia, Day After@ 8:am for Singapore)
The Contestants! (Name - Species - Trainer)

Furea - ( Jann , from Deior )
Omega - ( TecnoDragon , from Hengersrock )
Generic - ( FlyPlant , from Mepersoner )
Dorothy - ( Golem , from Petit-Trot )


The Chat location is the Delphi chatroom at http://monster-rancher-metropolis.com
You can get there by entering The Master Rancher's Lodge #47 from the front. Wagering is strictly prohibited.


Once you have logged in, Click on the 4X4 Monster Madness.

Some guidelines:
All visitors MUST be at least 13 years old.
All visitors are asked to please cease chatting while the actual fight is being broadcast by Monster Fenrick!
Other chat/board rules are to be observed, read the Lodge's Chat FAQ for details.

We hope everyone can attend! This particular chat is pretty good and responsive, the downside is that some people with older systems may have troubles with it. It's the only workable chat that could handle such a large crowd for us. It does require you to register with Delphi 24 hours prior to entering.


SEE MONSTERS AT: www.legendcup.com
- Click "TOURNAMENTS"
- Scroll down and Click "master Class #1"
- Click monster Name for Picture

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, May 11, 2002 - 07:27 am:

After several tournaments where there were one or two monsters which clearly towered over the others, we have the opposite here. Some might differ, but I see no clear-cut favorite among this bunch. Of course, that has never stopped me from setting a morning line...

MASTER CLASS MORNING LINE 5/14/02

MonsterBreedTrainerOdds
OmegaTecnoDragonHengersRock2-1
FureaJanneDeior5-2
DorothyGolemPetit-Trot3-1
GenericFlyPlantMepersoner3-1


As you can see, what I've done is to place the maxxed monsters first, and the unmaxxed ones next. As between the maxxed monsters, I think it's about time that Hengersrock and a dragon win one of these tourneys, so my choice is Omega. The dragon's better tech selection should ultimately outweigh the pixie's big advantage in guts regen. One thing, though - unlike most pixies, monsters cannot rest easy when Furea moves into close range...she can kick the hell out of you if you aren't careful. True, she didn't impress in the suspended dp tourney, but the competition here is ratcheted down significantly.

As between the unmaxxed monsters, I prefer Dorothy. Again, I look for the golem tech list to outweigh the plant's guts regen advantage. Although Generic has maxxed pow, i still am not as impressed with his front row of techs as with the pixie's...except for life steal, of course [and, for some reason, the flyplant does not even have maxxed int...]

Bottom line...this is a match in which upsets can, and will, happen. Should be some fun competition on Tuesday!

By Petit-Trot on Saturday, May 11, 2002 - 07:15 pm:

Dorothy's 2 not maxxed stats are ski and spd, those are the worst stats not to max for this type of tourney.
